title.narrative: Thailand Refrigeration and Air Conditioning NAMA (RAC NAMA)

description.narrative: The project aims at leapfrogging technological developments in the refrigeration & air conditioning (RAC) sector: 1. shaping the policy and regulatory framework; 2. supporting the production and assembly of local green RAC equipment; 3. preparing the service sector; 4. supporting the market introduction. It will transform the production and use of RAC appliances for both the domestic and commercial sectors. Manufacturers will be able to produce climate friendly & competitive products for the domestic & export markets. This will entail new jobs & training for technicians & lower energy & refrigerant bills for consumers. The project bundles and leverages financial mechanisms to promote climate friendly and energy-efficient RAC devices, e.g. through the RAC NAMA Revolving Fund. RAC equipment introduced within the project period will cut emissions by over 15 Mt CO2e over the equipment lifetime, resulting in an annual reduction of around 0.9 Mt by 2020 and a market penetration of about 20%.
